Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2009 01:38PM younggrandmaof2 wrote: Nipi, I know I have talked with you via PM but thought you and maybe others would benefit by knowing that my ADH dx was a little over 10 years ago and I have gone from bi-annual exams with my BS to annual ones...that is until now.  As you know I am scheduled for an excisional bx on Friday 12/4.  My BS is very good and has always gotten back with me with any concerns very quickly so I'm hoping for the same with this pathology report.  The waiting for the surgery has been a bear but my philosophy is to stay busy...so that is what I will do.  Good luck to all.
Posts.Title: Positive Stories Of Just Close Watch For ADH Nipi younggrandmaof2
